trans-unit.source: Provides UI support for working with extender controls at design time.
The ExtenderControlDesigner class enables you to interact with extender controls on the page at design time in an IDE such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
Only control developers and IDE developers have to interact with this class directly.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner"></xref> class.
Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ExtenderControlDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources that are held by any managed objects that this [{1}](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) references.
This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
Gets the standard HTML rendering of an extender control at design time, which includes type and ID information.
The design-time HTML rendering of the control.
Initializes the specified component and adds it to the component change service.
A component of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.IExtenderControl"></xref> that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> interface.
Adjusts the items listed in the properties grid for the control.
A dictionary that contains the properties for the control.
Gets a value that indicates whether the current control is displayed on the design surface so it can be selected and its properties can be edited.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current control is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
